description: Schema for storing and using variant data
title: Variant

___clinVarSCVs.description: List of ClinVar SCV ids associated to the variant
___clinVarSCVs.title: ClinVar SCV Accession

___canonicalTranscriptTitle.description: Variant title constructed with canonical transcript, gene symbol and protein change when the variant is not in ClinVar
___canonicalTranscriptTitle.title: Canonical Transcript Title

___hgvsNames.description: Object containing HGVS terms. Separated to GRCh37, GRCh38 and others
___hgvsNames.title: HGVS Terms

___otherNameList.description: List of legacy names associated with the variant
___otherNameList.title: Other Name List

___clinVarRCVs.description: List of ClinVar RCV ids associated to the variant
___clinVarRCVs.title: ClinVar RCV Accession

___carId.description: Canonical Allele Registration ID from Baylor's Allele Registration
___carId.title: CAR ID

___dbSNPIds.description: List of dbSNP ids related of the variant
___dbSNPIds.title: dbSNP ID

___molecularConsequenceList.description: List of object to store molecular consequence term, SO id to transcripts of the variant
___molecularConsequenceList.title: Molecular Consequence
